channel.title: Some one take a look at my .Run problem
channel.description:
Well i stoped coding servers for about 4months and when i come back i try to run my server and i get this error.. [URL=http://img140.imageshack.us/i/helpna.png/][IMG]http://img140.imageshack.us/img140/8417/helpna.png[/img][/URL] I dont know if i have to update my Java or what..but could some one please help me.. this is my Run Code [code=abap]@echo off title KilledOnCredit RunServer java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause[/code]

item.title: Some one take a look at my .Run problem
item.dc:creator: @Axiom_Owner Axiom Owner
item.description:
@Axiom_Owner wrote:

Well my post has been up for 2days…

ONTOPIC: I downloaded the newest java and it still doesnt work for some reason…idk any more could some one who knows take a look and give me some helpful information? thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Some one take a look at my .Run problem
item.dc:creator: @Axiom_Owner Axiom Owner
item.description:
@Axiom_Owner wrote:

[quote=“Ddragonimp, post:8, topic:373507”] @echo off title Run java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls
This assumes you have the server.class file in the same file as the run.bat[/quote]
Well yea i do…and it used to work…but should i just update my java and shit? or what?

Read full topic
item.source: Some one take a look at my .Run problem

item.title: Some one take a look at my .Run problem
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

@echo off
title Run
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
cls

This assumes you have the server.class file in the same file as the run.bat

Read full topic

@Axiom_Owner wrote:

Aintaro:

your directory is wrong, I can’t really help as I don’t know were you class files are located.

Could you maybe try and help me through this…idk if you busy or not…[quote=“demps2k9, post:5, topic:373507”]Try this:

@echo off
title Run
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
cls[/quote]
This is what im usually using

item.title: Some one take a look at my .Run problem
item.dc:creator: @nerdiam nerdiam
item.description:
@nerdiam wrote:

try my run
@echo off
title EvoScape
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\java.exe” -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause
